name: Welcome to hell (itch) (ERmilburn02)
description:
Gamepad support.

Free some souls from Hell.

Standard FPS controls. (Mouse / Right Stick to look, WASD  / Left Stick to move)

Skybox: Nebula HDRI nanoPack free 3D model | CGTrader
Player Controller: Starter Assets - Third Person Character Controller | Essentials | Unity Asset Store
Music: Yannick Fullager

Source Code: https://github.com/ERmilburn02/vimjam3
